dcterms:creator: Mark Everingham
Luc Van Gool
Christopher KI Williams
John Winn
Andrew Zisserman
dcterms:description: The Pascal-Part dataset includes images of horse, cow, and sheep, along with their 2D keypoints automatically computed using the ground-truth 2D part masks.
dcterms:title: Pascal-Part

dcterms:creator: Chun-Han Yao
Wei-Chih Hung
Yuanzhen Li
Michael Rubinstein
Ming-Hsuan Yang
Varun Jampani
dcterms:description: The LASSIE dataset includes web images of various animal species (zebra, tiger, giraffe, elephant, kangaroo, and penguin) with 2D keypoint annotations, manually filtered to ensure full visibility of animal bodies.
dcterms:title: LASSIE

dcterms:creator: Chun-Han Yao
Wei-Chih Hung
Yuanzhen Li
Michael Rubinstein
Ming-Hsuan Yang
Varun Jampani
dcterms:description: E-LASSIE is an extended version of the LASSIE dataset, which includes additional noisy web images where animals are occluded or truncated, along with annotated 2D keypoints for evaluation.
dcterms:title: E-LASSIE
